findings.title: Rewriting argument in canPerform function
findings.description: The `canPerform` function calls `dangerouslyCastUintArrayToBytes` which rewrites its argument `_params`. This may cause unintended behavior if the helper `arr` is not used.

findings.title: Optimize reentrancy guard for gas savings
findings.description: The reentrancy guard can be optimized using an incrementing value to yield 2-3 times gas savings in some cases.

findings.title: Add information about function side effect in ACL.sol
findings.description: We recommend at least adding the information about function side effect (rewriting argument `_how`) to the function documentation. At most, return the parameter to its original state.
